name: Say Something (Andreia Gonçalves (attahh), Tertulius, luishernandezv)
description:
Say Something | Ludum Dare 50

You bump into your crush on the street - quick, Say Something!

In this platform game, you have to delay your response so that you can quickly catch your thoughts and prevent saying something awkward… Good luck!

Controls

  • Arrow keys: Move and Jump

Game created by Andreia, Colombo and Tertulius for Ludum Dare 50 with the theme "Delay the Inevitable".  All assets created by us unless listed in the Credits below.

Credits

Lacquer - Google Fonts (Link)

Start Menu Music: syncopika
